title: IE pop-up window: Fiddler, process dump, Process Monitor and IEDigest
description: This action plan is for troubleshooting a website that is displaying an unexpected pop-up window in Internet Explorer.
head: fiddler
iedigest
process-dump-with-popup
procmon
main: Do whatever steps to reproduce the pop-up window in IE. Once the pop-up window appears, please **DO NOT** close it and proceed to next step.
